text: Halman may refer to: ==Boats== *Halman 20, a Canadian sailboat design ==Places== * Halman, Iran, a village in Kermanshah Province, Iran ==People== * James Halman (died 1702), Master of Gonville and Caius College, Cambridge * Abdullah Halman (born 1987), Turkish footballer * Ella Halman (1906–1995), English opera singer * Greg Halman (1987–2011), Dutch baseball player * Talât Sait Halman (born 1931), Turkish poet
title: Halman
